author: Bensley69
post_text: January 7, 2018 at 7:53â€¯AM#1Hey everyone,I have started using Macros and turns out they are nothing like Java hahah.So what i am trying to do is have a macro that everytime activated it triggers all my sequences, which i got to workCodeGo AllSequExecutorsBut what i want is that if i have set the executor on, then it triggers it.So- I turn on for examp sequence executor 1, 4 and 7- Hit macro execute button- and 1,4,7 advance and 2,3,6,8 don't move or turn onAnd i know i can set it to turn on then individually, but that would only work if it was always 1, 4 and 7 that i wanted to quickly trigger, next time it might be 2,5,10I did a bit of research but everything is very vague.Any help would be greatThanksBensley
title: Request: Go Sequence If Executor On
